Text: Travel Leisure Picks Our Best Travel GiftsFellow Traveler This month we are excited to highlight Travel Leisures favorite TravelSmith products Travel Leisure editors picked TravelSmith because the products combine style and function address a variety of needs and circumstances and are light packable and entirely uncomplicated travel companions Click here to see these top products Womens Indispensable Travel Pants These modern classics have the contemporary lines and smooth flattering fit you can depend on for an entire trip In fact theyre so versatile you may not need to pack another pair Theyre as casual or as dressy as you choose Wear them with a blouse and blazer for an elegant look with a turtleneck and multipocketed vest for more casual outings And their substantial fabric a blend of polyester rayon and Lyrcac for comfortable twoway stretch is as good looking and long wearing as wool without wools fussiness it defies wrinkles even after days of packing and wearing Clean nowaistband style has a side zipper and front darts for a trim shape a passportsize pocket behind the waist keeps cash credit card or papers neatly concealed Overnight Essentials Bag Compact sophisticated and ingeniously organized this carryon bag keeps all your travel essentials close at hand a reassuring feeling in case your luggage is lost or delayed in transit Open the smart handbaglike exterior to reveal multiple compartments one with compression straps that can hold a change of clothes another with elasticized shoe pockets The two spillproof plastic cases ideal for toiletries are conveniently removable for trips to the bathroom Made of premium nylon twill the Overnight Essentials Bag can be carried by its leatherwrapped handles or a detachable padded shoulder strap x x Mens ComfortMaxv Turtleneck Polar bears know how to weather the winter Each of their hairs is hollow to trap air and provide a warm layer of insulation Our ComfortMaxv Turtlenecks do the same thing for Homo sapiens Theyre made of a remarkable new jerseyknit fabric that blends highperformance ThermaStatv polyester with natural cotton for the ultimate in warmth and moisture control ThermaStatv also traps air in its hollow fibers providing exceptional insulation with very little weight just ounces per shirt The fabric also wicks moisture efficiently which means you stay dry and comfortable when youre walking or cycling These shirts dry quickly more than faster than cotton Womens Featherweight Leather Jacket Most leather jackets are best left in your closet at home theyre just too heavy bulky and impractical for travel Our Featherweight Leather Jacket is exceptional on all counts Its so lightweight and supple that you can easily pack it and so versatile youll wear it everywhere on your itinerary Weve used fine Italian calfskin and eliminated the shoulder pads for a finished weight of just ounces of unencumbered luxury Best of all the leather is treated to repel water and stains so you can enjoy this jacket in any weather The classic walking length covers your hips and provides the perfect proportion with pants or skirts Guaranteed No Questions No Exceptions We promise a full refund if you are not totally satisfied at any time you own a TravelSmith product Tested everywhere from the Amazon to Zihuatenejo TravelSmith products are designed to withstand the rigors of the road Thats why we stand confidently and fully behind everything we make Airplane Comfort Kit The airlines idea of comfort just doesnt measure up Scratchy handkerchiefsize sharedwithstrangers blankets and tiny lumpy pillows are a recipe for jet lag Next time you fly pack your own Airplane Comfort Kit instead The cloudsoft fleece pillow unzips to reveal a generous x doublefaced fleece blanket that surrounds you and only you with heavenly softness and lightweight warmth Theres even a thoughtfully placed pocket at the bottom in which to nestle your feet The pillow can be inflated to precisely your preferred level of firmness Blanket and pillow cover can be washed and dried by machine Pillow also available separately For those desiring added lumbar support the inflatable back pillow is a great comfort addon Mens Classic Packable Raincoat These handsome raincoats have the superior quality and classic style of those fashionable English macs But they go one better by being lightweight packable and waterproof ergo a far better value and the ideal raincoats for the road Most raincoats are not actually rainproof Made of suedesoft microfiber with a frankly sensual texture they weigh just ounces Best of all each folds into a compact travel pouch built into the lining The travel pouch slips easily into any carryon All styles are as impervious to fashion trends as it is to rain and wind Generous fit Medium PackIt Envelope These lightweight carriers are the answer to every frequent packers prayers Not only do they organize your travel wardrobe by category or function PackIt Envelopes prevent wrinkles by keeping clothing from shifting around in transit Youll even find you can pack more in less space because the PackIt compresses its load Three colors allow colorcoded organization Each PackIt Envelope comes with a folding board and instructions for quick and easy folding The medium size holds to dress shirts blouses or trousers From Eagle Creek Swiss Army Multi Tool A screw falls out of your eyeglasses A button pops off your pants The bike you rented needs a brake adjustment From the people who brought you Swiss Army knives this Multi Tool corrects a multitude of minor setbacks on the road and is compact enough to carry in your pocket In addition to the usual assortment of blades youll find a wide range of screwdrivers a bottle opener can opener corkscrew ballpoint pen tweezers pliers hex wrenches scissors a sewing eye different tools in all Imported from Switzerland long closed NOTABLE NEWS CHILDREN FLYING SOLO The holidays are here the season many children equate with shiny new toys gingerbread cookies steaming mugs of hot chocolate and airplane travel Each year millions of kids between the ages of five and fly unaccompanied on major airlines If your children or grandchildren will be flying unaccompanied this holiday season youll want to be prepared and knowledgeable before they get on the plane Below are a few tips from TravelSmith to help you make sure the children in your life are safe and happy travelers this holiday season Try to book only nonstop or direct flights so that the child does not need to change planes Changing planes can be intimidating and scary especially in major airports Where a minor must be assisted by airline personnel in order to change planes expect a fee of Do not drop your child off at the curb Parents or legal guardians are responsible for bringing the minor directly to the departure gate Get to the airport early Parents or legal guardians should allot time to fill out all paperwork required for unaccompanied minors most importantly the paperwork that travels with the child Because inflight food service can be slow or delayed its a good idea to pack some favorite snacks for the child to carry onto the flight Parents or legal guardians should provide the airline with written information about how flight delays or cancellations should be handled including emergency contacts and a means to pay for necessities such as overnight accommodations Upon arrival at the destination point airline personnel are required to escort the child off the plane They are not allowed to turn the child over to a waiting parent or guardian without seeing the adults identification and matching it with the information on the form filled out before departure An authorized parent or guardian must pick the child up at the arrival gate Not only is it important for the childs sense of security to be met personally at the arrival gate but in some cases children will be turned over to local child welfare authorities if no parent or guardian is present to pick them up If you feel you have received this message in error or you wish to be removed from the list you can unsubscribe by going to mutrvtaspeDJAMESDERRICKenroncom
